title: Build BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES agricultural products website with admin CMS

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for Product with fields: id (Text), name (Text), price (Float), shortDescription (Text), fullDescription (Text), imageUrl (Text), createdAt (Int), updatedAt (Int)
acceptanceCriteria: Product type includes all specified fields
Backend can store and retrieve product data

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for BusinessInfo with fields: businessName (Text), contactPhone (Text), contactEmail (Text), businessAddress (Text), aboutText (Text)
acceptanceCriteria: BusinessInfo type includes all specified fields
Backend stores single business info record with editable fields

requirements.text: Implement backend authentication using Internet Identity with a single admin principal stored in stable memory. Include functions: isAdmin(caller: Principal) -> Bool, and protect all write operations (add/edit/delete products, update business info) to require admin authentication

quotes: login or sign up and log out function only for my self

acceptanceCriteria: Admin principal is stored and persisted
Only authenticated admin can modify data
Public users can read products and business info without authentication

requirements.text: Implement backend CRUD operations for products: addProduct(name, price, shortDescription, fullDescription, imageUrl) -> Result<Product, Text>, updateProduct(id, name, price, shortDescription, fullDescription, imageUrl) -> Result<Product, Text>, deleteProduct(id) -> Result<(), Text>, getProduct(id) -> ?Product, getAllProducts() -> [Product]. All write operations must verify admin authentication
acceptanceCriteria: All CRUD operations work correctly
Write operations are protected by admin authentication
Read operations are publicly accessible

requirements.text: Implement backend functions for business info management: getBusinessInfo() -> BusinessInfo (public), updateBusinessInfo(businessName, contactPhone, contactEmail, businessAddress, aboutText) -> Result<BusinessInfo, Text> (admin only). Initialize with default values: businessName = 'BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES', contactPhone = '+1234567890', contactEmail = 'contact@bajarangi.com', businessAddress = 'Business Address', aboutText = 'About BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES'

quotes: change address of business and number as well as email can be changed

acceptanceCriteria: Business info is initialized with default values
Public users can read business info
Only admin can update business info

requirements.text: Create a Home page (/home or /) with agriculture-themed hero section, business name 'BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES' prominently displayed, business introduction text fetched from backend BusinessInfo, and a 'View Products' button that navigates to the Products page

quotes: Home Page – Agriculture-themed design with images (fields, crops, farmers), business introduction, and 'View Products' button

acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays business name and introduction
View Products button navigates to products listing
Page uses agriculture theme with green colors

requirements.text: Create a Products page (/products) with a responsive grid layout displaying product cards. Each card shows: product image, product name, current price, short description, and a 'Call to Order' button that opens the device's phone dialer with the business contact number from backend

quotes: Products Page – Grid layout with product image, name, price (editable), short description, and 'Call to Order' button
order by directly calling the given phone number

acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed in a responsive grid
Each card shows all required product information
Call to Order button initiates phone call with business number

requirements.text: Create a Product Details page (/products/:id) displaying: large product image, full product description, current price, product name, and a 'Click to Call' button that opens the device's phone dialer with the business contact number

quotes: Product Details Page – Large image, description, updated price, and click-to-call button

acceptanceCriteria: Product details page shows complete product information
Large image is prominently displayed
Click to Call button initiates phone call

requirements.text: Create an About Us page (/about) displaying information about BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES fetched from backend BusinessInfo.aboutText field, with agriculture-themed styling

quotes: About Us Page – Information about BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES

acceptanceCriteria: About page displays business information from backend
Page follows agriculture theme styling

requirements.text: Create a Contact page (/contact) displaying: business phone number (clickable to call), business email (clickable mailto link), business address, and a simple contact form with fields for name, email, phone, and message. All contact details are fetched from backend BusinessInfo

quotes: Contact Page – Editable phone number, editable email, and simple contact form

acceptanceCriteria: Contact page displays all business contact details
Phone and email are clickable
Contact form includes all specified fields

requirements.text: Implement admin authentication UI with Internet Identity integration: Login button in header (visible when not authenticated), Logout button in header (visible when authenticated as admin), protected route wrapper that redirects non-admin users away from admin pages

quotes: add login or sign up and log out function only for my self

acceptanceCriteria: Login/Logout buttons appear appropriately based on auth state
Admin pages are protected from unauthorized access
Internet Identity authentication flow works correctly

requirements.text: Create an Admin Dashboard page (/admin) accessible only to authenticated admin, with navigation to: Manage Products, Edit Business Info sections. Display current business name and admin status

quotes: where i can access the web and can list items and their prices

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard is only accessible when authenticated
Dashboard provides clear navigation to admin features

requirements.text: Create an Admin Products Management page (/admin/products) with: product listing table showing name, price, and actions; 'Add New Product' button opening a form modal; Edit button for each product opening edit form modal; Delete button with confirmation dialog; Forms include fields for name, price, short description, full description, and image URL input with preview
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can view all products in a table
Add/Edit forms include all product fields with validation
Delete requires confirmation
Image URL shows preview when entered
All operations call backend endpoints correctly

requirements.text: Create an Admin Business Info Editor page (/admin/business-info) with a form to edit: Business Name, Contact Phone, Contact Email, Business Address, About Text. Include Save button and success/error feedback

quotes: change address of business and number as well as email can be changed

acceptanceCriteria: Form displays current business info from backend
All fields are editable
Save button updates backend successfully
User receives feedback on save success or failure

requirements.text: Implement a responsive navigation header component visible on all pages with: Business logo/name, navigation links (Home, Products, About, Contact), Admin/Login button (context-sensitive), mobile hamburger menu for small screens. Use green agriculture color scheme
acceptanceCriteria: Header is visible and functional on all pages
Navigation works on desktop and mobile
Green color scheme is applied consistently

requirements.text: Apply mobile-responsive design across all pages using Tailwind CSS responsive utilities, ensuring layouts adapt properly for mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports. Product grids should show 1 column on mobile, 2 on tablet, 3-4 on desktop
acceptanceCriteria: All pages are fully responsive
Product grid adapts to screen size
Touch interactions work properly on mobile

requirements.text: Apply a consistent green agriculture theme throughout the website with: Primary green color (#22c55e or similar agricultural green) for buttons and accents, earth tones for backgrounds, clean typography, nature-inspired design elements. Use Tailwind's color utilities
acceptanceCriteria: Green color scheme is applied consistently across all pages
Design evokes agricultural/nature theme
Colors are accessible and professional

requirements.text: Add HTML meta tags for SEO optimization including: page titles describing each page, meta descriptions for main pages, Open Graph tags for social sharing with business name and description, mobile viewport meta tag

quotes: Make it shareable to other through link

acceptanceCriteria: All main pages have descriptive titles and meta descriptions
Open Graph tags enable proper link previews
Mobile viewport is configured correctly

requirements.text: Display generated agriculture-themed images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated. Include hero image on Home page, product placeholder images on Products page, and background images for About and Contact pages

quotes: Agriculture-themed design with images (fields, crops, farmers)

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are properly integrated as static assets
Images enhance the agriculture theme on all relevant pages
Images load efficiently and are responsive

constraints: Use Internet Identity for authentication (single admin only)
No online payment system or e-commerce checkout
Phone orders only via click-to-call buttons
All image references must use URLs or paths (no file upload processing in backend)

required: Agriculture hero image showing green crop fields and blue sky for home page header (hero-agriculture.dim_1920x600.png)
Farmer in field illustration showing person working with crops for about page (farmer-working.dim_800x600.png)
Fresh vegetables and crops product photo showing variety of agricultural produce (products-showcase.dim_1200x800.png)
Agriculture contact background with field landscape for contact page (contact-background.dim_1600x900.png)
Wheat or grain close-up photo for page decorative elements (grain-texture.dim_600x400.png)
Green tractor icon or illustration for business branding (tractor-icon.dim_200x200.png)
